name: KOTOMASHO: I Can't Believe This NEET Guy Turned Into a Magical Girl!
name_original: KOTOMASHO: I Can't Believe This NEET Guy Turned Into a Magical Girl!
description:
- このNEET男が魔法少女に変身したなんて信じられない -

Kono nīto otoko ga mahō shōjo ni henshin shita nante shinjirarenai

The Story of an everyday NEET, a guy with no job  that goes into VR all day,  but suddenly acquired magical powers...

WAIT.  DID HE JUST TRANSFORMED INTO A MAGICAL GIRL!?!?

  • Use your Magical Power to navigate through the realm of dreams and save people from nightmares in this adventure game with RPG elements!
  •  Gather different types of powers to defeat your enemies
  • Explore Procedurally Generated Dungeons to gain experience and defeat the evil nightmares that torment the dreams of many people
DOWNLOAD BELOW!

*This is a prototype made in 72 hours for the Mini Jam 105: Dreamy.  Assets, mechanics, and polishing is not final and might be improved for a full fledged game - If you find any bugs please let me know in the comments*

FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER FOR PIXEL ART AND GAMEDEV

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER FOR FEEDBACK OR TO HANG OUT

@WalGallen

CONTROLS:

WASD / ARROW KEYS - Movement

MOUSE LEFT CLICK / Z - Attack / Next dialogue / Interact

ESC - Pause
